segments.text: I think this scene is kind of charming in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies from the jar, so sneaky and fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's up on the stool, reaching just right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sisterâ€™s excited, hand out for one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Mom's busy drying dishes, letting them have their moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's running, but it's just a little overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle adds a playful splash to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden looks lovely and sunny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a typical family kitchen, full of life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the curtains are tied back, letting light in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies must taste great; wish I had one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the unstable stool adds some adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This makes me smile, seeing their little mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
